text.div:
VhDir Primary Source Failure Action

This value set defines a set of codes that indicate various states in the validation process that a given that a resource or element may be in at a point in time.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/ig/vhdir/CodeSystem/codesystem-validation
    CodeDisplay
    fatalA failure that is likely relevant to local workflow environments, considered sufficient to suspend the resource/element and one or more action has been taken.to review
    warningA failure that may be relevant to some local workflow environments, but in and of itself is not consider sufficient to suspend the resource/element. E.g. validating membership in an organization.to review
    recordonlyA failure that may be relevant to some local workflow environments and will be documented but not result in notification or publication of the error.to review

name: VhDir Primary Source Failure Action
description: This value set defines a set of codes that indicate various states in the validation process that a given that a resource or element may be in at a point in time.

contains.display: A failure that is likely relevant to local workflow environments, considered sufficient to suspend the resource/element and one or more action has been taken.
A failure that  may be relevant to some local workflow environments, but in and of itself is not consider sufficient to suspend the resource/element. E.g. validating membership in an organization.
A failure that may be relevant to some local workflow environments and will be documented but not result in notification or publication of the error.
